attributes.action: To uphold the first referendum Deal or No Deal
attributes.background:
To keep this country democratic and to protect the interest of the people voice.
remaining in the EU should be off the table.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We aren't sure exactly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign one of these petitions if it is something you would like to see happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/226071

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233063

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/221747
